overview: 'Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship 4: USA vs Mexico' was a bare-knuckle fighting event held by Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship on February 2, 2019 at the Beto √Åvila Stadium in Cancun, Mexico.  This was the first international bare-knuckle boxing event by Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship (BKFC).
title: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship 4
